attributes.action: allow a referendum on the e.u. treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: allow a referendum on the e.u. treaty

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
